items.sentence: I noticed that Tom was wearing a new pair of shoes.
I often sit on the porch and read in the afternoon.
I only did that because I had nothing better to do.
I only met Tom once, but he seemed like a nice guy.
Tom considers himself to be a citizen of the world.
Tom crossed the river by jumping from rock to rock.
Tom decided to buy a used car instead of a new one.
Tom is one of the best guitar players in Australia.
Tom is the only one who seems to be having any fun.
Tom may be the only one who can solve this problem.
Tom met Mary by chance on his way home from school.
Tom needs to find an apartment near where he works.
I thought Tom didn\'t have a driver\'s license yet.
I hope Tom likes the present that I bought for him.
I intend to phone Tom tomorrow and ask him to help.
I received a $300 gift card from Tom for Christmas.
I thought I told you to stay away from my computer.
On Monday, I\'m going to visit my sister in Boston.
One of Tom\'s problems is his short attention span.
If you want to go to the art museum, take this bus.
In case of an emergency, what number should I call?
In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
Is Tom still interested in going to Boston with us?
Is it true that Tom wants to paint his house green?
It was a pity that Tom couldn\'t come to our party.
Tom isn\'t as naive as a lot of people think he is.
Tom isn\'t the least bit worried about the weather.
What time did Tom say his party was going to start?
When I was young, people always told me I was ugly.
Where did you work before you started working here?
Tom said he\'s going to attend tomorrow\'s meeting.
You\'ve already sung that song three times tonight.
A great many houses were damaged in the earthquake.
Are there any French-speaking doctors working here?
Bring me a clean plate and take the dirty one away.
Can you please tell me where the nearest church is?
Where do you think you\'re going dressed like that?
Who\'s your favorite player on our basketball team?
Why do you want to know what we\'re thinking about?
My father\'s company is on the verge of bankruptcy.
My guess is that Tom doesn\'t have so many friends.
My gut feeling is that Tom won\'t show up tomorrow.
She agreed with him on what to do with the old car.
When I came home, my sister was playing the guitar.
You are working too hard. Take it easy for a while.
You could count to ten when you were two years old.
Tom wasn\'t very good at reading between the lines.
Tom won\'t go to sleep unless you read him a story.
Did Tom ever tell you what he wanted for Christmas?
Tom and his friends played basketball last weekend.
